main event: An oval object about 10-12 feet in diameter was observed moving at high speed from South to North at an altitude of about 500-800 feet.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 5-10 seconds,There was no observed trail or sound,The object did not maneuver at any time,The sighting was made from an office window,The weather conditions were clear, with a half-moon.
sighted object: oval object moving in the sky
witness description: Observation made from the main office of Conners Steel Division of H.R.E. Regional Inspection Supervisor's Office.
